attr.title: Climb
attr.desc: Climb is a bullet-ridden 2D platformer in which you play a knight fighting and climbing out of a prison tower with the help of a magical sword that shoots bullets! Includes 5 levels of increasing difficulty! Various enemy types! Traps! A unique mechanic where you shoot at the floor to jump higher! Single life challenge!
attr.inst: Download game from https://junchmakes.itch.io/climb, copy data.win to /ports/climb/gamedata
